**Title:** 
EE517-230242: Supply of Liquid Propane for Heating and Equipment

**Reference #:**
WS3612526670-Doc3612729016

**Amendment to Closing Time:**

Please take note of the updated closing time for the Request for Proposal (RFP). Bids must now be submitted by 2 PM EDT on October 4, 2022. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Request for Proposal:**
=====================================

The Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services, is issuing a Request for Proposal for the supply of liquid propane for heating to the Maurice Lamontagne Institute in Mont-Joli, QC. The scope of work includes the installation, maintenance, and repair of tanks and equipment as needed. This requirement is to be fulfilled for a period of two years, with options for a one-year extension in each subsequent year.

**Requirements:**
-------------------------------------
The requirement includes the supply of propane for heating, as well as the installation, maintenance, and repair of tanks and equipment. This must be carried out in Mont-Joli, QC, Canada, as per Section 7 of the RFP.

**Technical Specifications:**
-----------------------------

* UNSPSC Codes: 
  * 15111501: Propane
  * 24111802: Air or gas tanks or cylinders
  * 24111808: Fuel storage tanks
  * 24111816: Liquified gas tank or cylinder
  * 25172400: Fuel tanks and systems
  * 25202400: Aircraft fuel tanks and systems

**Commercial Terms:**
--------------------

* The contract value is not disclosed.
* The contract is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and other free trade agreements applicable to Canada.
* The procurement method is competitive, with open bidding.
* The selection criteria are lowest price.
